                                 Integer version,
                                 String user,
                                 TaskRunStatus status)
                          throws SQLException
        Get TaskLogs that match the specified criteria.
        Parameters:
        identifier - optional Task identifier.
        version - optional version.
        user - optional user.
        status - optional status.
        Returns:
        a list of TaskLogs order by date run descending.
        Throws:
        SQLException - if an error occurs.
